|brand = Compex |model = WLE1000V5 |submodelappend = <!-- yes for space --> |submodel = -20 |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 04/04/2017 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Compex_WLE1000V5-20 |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = AC1750 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = Mini PCIe |if_bus_version = 2.0 |ifconnector = <!-- Interface Connector Type, Leave blank for none --> |formfactor = Mini Card
|vendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |device_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = <!-- OUI -->
|chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9982; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = U.FL |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |txchains = 3 |rxchains = 3 |sstreams = 3 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |802.11ac = 1300 |nqam = <!-- 600, 750, 900, 1000 --> |802.11n = 450/450 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 5 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv =

|availability = sampling |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 04/2017 |price = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |country = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== ===Product Key Features=== *[[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9982 ''(‘’Beeliner’’)'' *5GHz max 20dBm output power (per chain) *Heat sink allows free air operation *802.11ac compliant & backward compatible :with 802.11a/n, up to 1.3Gbps *Multi-user MIMO (MU-MIMO) beamformer *802.11ac explicit transmit beamforming (TxBF) and legacy :implicit TxBF for both beamformer and beamformee *3 spatial streams (3SS) at 80MHz *Mini PCI Express 2.0 interface *Supports Spatial Multiplexing, Cyclic-Delay Diversity (CDD), :Maximal Ratio Combining (MRC), Space Time Block Code (STBC), :Low-Density Parity Check (LDPC) Codes *Supports 802.11d,e,h,i,j,k,r,u, v time stamp, w,z standards *Supports Dynamic Frequency Selection (DFS) *Designed for High Bandwidth Enterprise Wireless Access Points
===Purchase Sample=== [http://shop.compex.com.sg/ Compex System Sample Store]
===Software Compatibility=== *[https://wiki.compex.com.sg/wiki/802.11ac_Wave_2_Board_Data LEDE Customized Board Data] *[https://wiki.compex.com.sg/wiki/Ath10k_Compatibility Tested Ath10k Build]
[[Category:English Documentation]]
